3.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan and the Sunnah Regarding It

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Uthman said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Whoever hears the Adhan when he is in the mosque, then goes out and does not go out for any (legitimate) need and does not intend to return, is a hypocrite

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا أُذِّنَ وَأَنْتَ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ فَلاَ تَخْرُجْ
chapter.eng-name: If The Adhan Is Called And You Are In The Mosque, Then Do Not Leave
